DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare effectiveness two management strategy patient recent onset low back pain ( LBP ) . One base usual care base early access physical therapy follow pragmatic treatment-based classification approach . The secondary purpose compare subsequent healthcare utilization associate two management strategy well evaluate importance psychosocial factor outcomes within group treatment . The overall hypothesis guiding study additional initial treatment expense incur early implementation result superior short-term clinical effectiveness , cost-effective long-term due reduce healthcare utilization . We also explore importance psychosocial factor outcomes within treatment group , may provide insight improve treatment strategy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Early Physical Therapy Versus Usual Care Low Back Pain

We hypothesize early physical therapy access Soldiers result great improvement function quality life 1 year compare step care strategy . 2 . Compare subsequent healthcare utilization associate two management strategy patient recent onset combat-related LBP . We hypothesize early physical therapy access result decrease healthcare utilization 1 year compare step care strategy . 3 . Evaluate importance psychosocial factor outcomes within group treatment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Military personnel active duty eligible healthcare military treatment facility A primary complaint low back pain define symptom pain and/or numbness 12th rib buttock without symptom leg ( ) , , opinion provider , originate tissue lumbar region . Duration current episode low back pain < 90 day Age 18 60 year ( emancipated minor active duty ) Available follow 4 week complete regimen treatment Oswestry Disability Index < 20 % History receiving medical care episode low back pain within last 3 month Prior surgery thoracolumbar spine pelvis This episode back pain due traumatic fracture Pending medical physical evaluation board discharge process , pending litigation relate condition , plan get military within next 9 month . Any `` red flag '' would indicate potentially serious condition significant disease process . These could include limited cauda equina syndrome , large rapidly progress neurological deficit , fracture , cancer , ankylose spondylitis , systemic disease . Current episode occur motor vehicle accident Currently pregnant ( history pregnancy previous 6 month )
